channel.title: Blog
channel.description: This is where we will post updates, funding requests and copies of pertinent documents here in addition to related news.

item.title: Why Two Blogs?
item.description:
In our attempt to be transparent, while still having all the technical skills of a history teacher, we have decided that the easiest, cleanest way to be transparent is to archive all of our old documents, discussions, meeting notes, and emails to a single Transparency blog. Information updates will happen on a sporadic basis by Jessica Chacon.

The second one will be focused on updates and news. It will be written roughly twice a week by Catherine Leys. (Clearly these first two entries were written by Jessica.)

item.title: From Globaleyes to Running Chicken
item.description: We are rebooting this site! We have changed our name, are redesigning the logo, and setting up new fundraisers. We are still the same organization - working to help support the efforts of the Children’s Rescue Mission, health initiatives and job-training for widows in Kisumu, Kenya. Our goal is still to be a transparent organization, so you can see how decisions are made and how money is used. We will continue to post photo updates from Kenya.
